abstract: Eclipsed by the since-departed Derrick Mason in September, Jeremy Kerley has since emerged as a favorite target of Mark Sanchez.
snippet: Eclipsed by the since-departed Derrick Mason in September, Jeremy Kerley has since emerged as a favorite target of Mark Sanchez.
lead_paragraph: A quick look at the Jets' 27-21 victory over San Diego:

headline.main: Kerley Making the Jets Forget About Mason
